description:
A beautiful Williamsburg apt.; 2 min away from the subway, 10min to get to Manhattan; East Village with many nice cafes and restaurants. 15 min to the West Village with the famous High Line and Chelsea market.

We have the best view on Manhattan from our fully furnished rooftop. 
Gym access in the building! 

You’ll love our place because of the location, the ambiance, the outdoors space, the people, and our home is light, comfy. It's perfect for couples that are away for the weekend.

The space is clean, light, spacious, new and comfy! You can use the WiFi and TV, and we have washing and drying in the apt! Just 2 minutes walking to the subway at Grand Street

You will be able to access the whole apartment + the spacious rooftop + the gym

Let me know if you want information about the city, we have some nice recommendations and tips for you

Williamsburg is the place to be in New York, the neighborhood has so much to offer, from cafes to restaurants and young creative people. We just nextto Bushwick, another creative neighborhood where a lot of artistic people live, street art, restaurants and easy to reach with the public transport, also Uber and Lyft stops here.
name: Romantic Williamsburg apt min away from Manhattan!
review: Maria was very welcoming & friendly. She kept in touch with us and check in/check out went smoothly. The apartment was impeccably clean, quiet, bright, and comfortable. I would recommend this apartment if you are looking to stay in the Williamsburg area. It is a 4th floor walk-up
